analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/46/0x3153ff1812ea126dab0e3bb8482d541c03ae15a7.sol:
	Contract ToineroToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/46/0x3153ff1812ea126dab0e3bb8482d541c03ae15a7.sol#209)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/46/0x3153ff1812ea126dab0e3bb8482d541c03ae15a7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/46/0x3153ff1812ea126dab0e3bb8482d541c03ae15a7.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/46/0x3153ff1812ea126dab0e3bb8482d541c03ae15a7.sol#79) is not in mixedCase
